ygData.subject: RE:DUH Spirit POUch
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Noob (friendly term not derogatory) big words for trollie heheh Anyway: spirit pouch can be summoned by a shaman like me... good news:
ygData.messageBody:
Dear Noob (friendly term not derogatory) big
words for trollie heheh<br><br>Anyway: spirit pouch can
be summoned by a shaman like me...<br><br>good news:
things in it don't weigh as much as when they are in say
a backpack<br><br>bad news: which I am sure you
know by now, is that if you go linkdead, your computer
crashes or you camp and log out, everything in the spirit
pouch including the pouch is gone for good, just like
summoned food or water...<br><br>Take care brush your
hair<br><br>Grumph, trollie shammie<br>21st lvl <br>Vazaelle
server<br><br>I usually donate summoned stuff too if I'm gonna
log and it'll be lost anyway...<br><br>have fun and
barsh a few on the head hehe
